entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -23.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 9:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -23.8°C
Pressure: 103.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 39 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -33.9°C
Wind: N 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
